author: veithen
msg: Added a Maven module that can be used to host code shared by LLOM and DOOM without exposing it in axiom-api. maven-shade-plugin is used to include that code into axiom-impl and axiom-dom, in order to avoid introducing a new OSGi bundle (which would have to export these packages) and Maven dependency.
